attributes.comment:
We are in the process of an adoption. The cost is so high to begin with to start a
family. Please do not increase the fees and make it harder for those of us who
want children but can not have them naturally to become a family. So many
children are abused and negleted by parents that dont want them. It is a sad that
in this country you have to buy a child for so high a price. Those that want to go
thru the State sometime have to wait for such a long time that they get
discouraged and go overseas like we did. Beacause my husband is serving
overseas in Iraq we were told we would have to wait the 18 months until he
returned home before we could get a child with the State of NC. We have since
applied with an agency to go to China. So much for our State support for adoption
and children with no home. Thanks for your time.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by L Fine
